snippet.title: The American Midwest: An Interpretive Encyclopedia - Page 889
snippet.description: Girls' basketball became popular throughout the nation by the turn of the twentieth century. In Iowa, it emerged as a fixture of girls' sports in both rural and urban areas. The first Iowa high school girls' state tournament was held in 1920. At that ...
